headline: Why Micron (MU) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
summary: Shares of memory chips maker Micron (NYSE:MU) fell 2.7% in the afternoon session after the semiconductor sector pulled back, triggered by a disappointing forecast from peer Marvell Technology.

raw.headline: Why Micron (MU) Shares Are Trading Lower Today
raw.summary: Shares of memory chips maker Micron (NYSE:MU) fell 2.7% in the afternoon session after the semiconductor sector pulled back, triggered by a disappointing forecast from peer Marvell Technology.

headline: Nvidia stock slides 3% amid broader chip sell-off after Dell results, Alibaba competition
summary: Nvidia and other chip stocks fell Friday to round out a mixed week for the sector as Nvidia's latest earnings report garnered a tepid reaction from investors.

headline: Stock Index Futures Slip With Focus on U.S. PCE Inflation Data
summary: September S&P 500 E-Mini futures (ESU25) are down -0.27%, and September Nasdaq 100 E-Mini futures (NQU25) are down -0.47% this morning as investors trimmed risk ahead of the release of the Federal Reserve’s first-line inflation gauge, which could offer more insight into the interest-rate outlook.
